title: Set up project structure
description: Create the basic project structure with frontend and backend directories
prompt: Create a new project with React frontend and Python FastAPI backend. Set up the basic directory structure and configuration files.

title: Implement user authentication
description: Create login and registration endpoints with JWT tokens
prompt: Implement user authentication system with JWT tokens. Create login, register, and logout endpoints. Include password hashing and validation.

title: Create database models
description: Define Pydantic models for users, projects, and other entities
prompt: Create Pydantic models for the application. Include User, Project, Task, and Memory models with proper validation and relationships.

title: Build React components
description: Create reusable React components for the frontend
prompt: Create React components for the application. Include components for project list, task management, and chat interface. Use TypeScript and modern React patterns.
